```{r}
B <- 10^4
M <- replicate(B, {
    y <- rnorm(100, 0, 1)
    quantile(y, 0.75)
})
median(M)
x_hat <- mean(M)
x_hat
(x_hat*(1-x_hat)/100)
sd(M)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
 B <- 10^4


funct <- function(a){
   #set.seed(1)
   y <- rnorm(100, 0, 1)
set.seed(1)
    
    (quantile(y, 0.75))
    
}
indexes <- createResample(y, B)
test <- sapply(indexes, funct)
mean(test)
sd(test)
median(test)
#test
mean(test) + 1.96 * sd(test) * c(-1, 1)
```
